name: Wolfpack Island
description:
Wolfpack Island, a multiplayer wolf virtual world

Explore an island, meet others wolves in a multiplayer world, mine for resources, plant and harvest crops and take part in a wide-range of mini-games and activities!

Features

  • Mine for resources
  • Complete quests to get rare items for your wolf
  • Compete against your friends in minigames
  • Tend to and plant in your farm
  • Chat with friends
  • Shop for new clothing items for your wolf
  • and much more, plus new content regularly!
